title: karuNai kaDalE
sahitya:
karuNai kaDalE kai viDEl 

anupallavi



teruL naL poruL nal tiru meittiDa tara bhakti aruL sharaN uTriDa



caraNam



 vana mOhanamAn aruL mAdaruL tEn tinaimAvin hitam teri mOhitanE ghana

mOhanamAmayil

vAhananE manamOhana mAl marugA guhanE dinam Or tanamODu aruL mA

dhanamE tiru mA

mayilai aru mAmukhanE ghana kAmadhEnukA ena  rumE kavi kunjara dAsanukkaruL

nalamE
